metadata.name: 「暁光(Gyoukou)」天照大御神(Amaterasu) 祝詞(Norito)
metadata.created_by: kAmI no Hukuin (midorin | みどりん)
metadata.description:
イラスト：AI & みどりん　原曲：MIDI AI & みどりん　作曲&編曲：森乃　作詞：森乃　歌：AI  
夢現（ゆめうつつ）で見た景色は  
淡い淡い朝焼けで  
大きく息を吸い込んだ時の  
冷たい澄んだ空気

両手広げ  
救いたい全てを  
儚い未来を  
繋ぎ止めている

祈り捧げ  
瞳（ひとみ）閉じる  
静かな時間  
全ての源になる  
力授ける

光に照らされ  
世界が今日も目を覚ました  
開き始めた花に  
君の笑顔浮かべる


暖かな風が吹き抜け  
緑の木々を揺らした  
鮮やかな自然とその心よ  
穏やかであれと

いつか君と共に見た空を  
思い出せばほら  
光が灯る

強い風も覆い尽くす  
決して消えない情熱を  
変わらず持ち続け  
生きていく

光に照らされ  
世界が今日も目を覚ました  
開き始めた花に  
君の笑顔浮かべる

光に満たされ  
世界が輝きを増していく  
闇を消し去るように  
届けようこの光

------------------------------  
Illustration by AI & Midorin Original Music by MIDI AI & Midorin Composition & Arrangement by Morino Lyrics by Morino Song by AI  
The scenery that I saw in my dream-Utsutsu  
In the pale, pale morning glow  
When I took a big breath in  
The cold clear air

I open my arms  
Everything I want to save  
I'm holding on to the fleeting future  
I'm holding on to it

Praying and offering  
Close your eyes  
Silent time  
Become the source of all  
Give me strength

Shining in the light  
The world wakes up today  
In the flowers that are beginning to open  
With your smile on your face


A warm wind blew through  
And shook the green trees  
Vibrant nature and its heart  
Be at peace

I remember the sky that I saw with you one day  
I remember the sky that I saw with you  
Lights up the sky

That covers even the strongest wind  
The passion that will never fade away  
I'll hold on to it as ever  
And live on

The light shines on me  
The world wakes up today  
In the flowers that are beginning to open  
I see your smile

Filled with light  
The world grows brighter and brighter  
As if to erase the darkness  
I bring you this light
